articles.title: US extends travel restrictions at Mexican and Canadian land borders as it makes plans to allow fully vaccinated foreign visitors to fly to America - CNN

articles.title: The US death toll from Covid-19 just surpassed that of the 1918 flu pandemic - CNN
articles.description: Despite all the advances of the past 103 years, the current pandemic has killed more Americans than the deadliest pandemic of the 20th century. And it's clear some mistakes made back then have been repeated, an epidemiologist says.
articles.content:
(CNN)Despite all the scientific and medical advances of the past 103 years, the Covid-19 pandemic has now killed more Americans than the 1918 flu pandemic did.
